ActorTalk: Dear Commercial Square business owners, my name is [PlayerName]. I'm ordered by BCC to be the Chief Commissioner from today.
To maintain order in the square and foster a healthy market for all, we've decided to form a mutual aid group—the Square Business Owners' Committee.
The committee will oversee fair distribution of BCC-provided resources, operate under group supervision, and prevent any action that harms our shared interests.
Joining the committee is completely voluntary. You're all welcome to sign up, and I'll personally oversee its operations.
Apologies, Gray Raven Commandant. But I must oppose your proposal.
And you are...?
Director of Market Expansion at the Flourish Guild, founder of the Commercial Alliance, angel investor in the district—
Councilor Hertha Buchanan.
Since we're all gathered here, I'll speak plainly: the Flourish Guild is against this committee.
I admire your military record, but commercial matters should be handled by professionals.
The Commercial District is built on transparency and fair competition. The authorities just need to collect their taxes. Why meddle in local commerce?
How do you know this "guild" is actually the Flourish Guild?
I've already turned it over to the proper authorities. The investigation will determine if you're involved.
Tch! Either way, you still can't prove that list has anything to do with us!
My, my, Councilor Hertha. Keep flailing like this and your family name's going to be the laughingstock of the district.
Huh? And who the heck are you to insult my family?
I-I believe in [PlayerName]. I want to join the committee.
Statement: In line with the General Manager's wishes, Fancy Food will also cooperate with the Gray Raven Commandant.
You...! Fine. So you're all turning against me.
No matter. I'll wait for you amateurs to go bankrupt, then take over. And when that happens, I'll have you begging on your knees.
Best of luck in your work, [PlayerName].
...That concludes my inauguration speech. No matter what lies ahead, I will fulfill my duties and do everything I can to build a fair and safe market for all.
I believe that with everyone's support—both business owners and the council—we'll achieve the goals of the square's development plan.
(Cheers)
According to the government's Commercial District Management Regulations, BCC has the authority to appoint a Chief Commissioner to oversee development zones.
As the Commissioner, my oversight of the square fully aligns with those regulations.
You, on the other hand—the so-called "Flourish Guild"—have been bullying merchants behind the scenes and disrupting the market.
Management... regulations?
And... who gives you the right to accuse us of disrupting the market? I won't stand for that kind of slander!
I know you mean well, Commandant, but that doesn't give you the right to meddle in business.
(I need to think carefully about how to respond...)
Answer my question directly, Commandant!
Wh-what is this?!
I saw someone delivering threatening letters to merchants here at the square. This list was dropped during the incident. It names all the guild's intended targets.
If you can't back up your words, then we have no reason to follow your lead.
Hmph. Other merchants, huh?
Anyone here care to admit they told the Commissioner such baseless nonsense?
See? No one!
(Cite the Commercial District Management Regulations in response)
I'm just trying to help.
I'm just following orders...
I have a list right here.
I refuse to answer you.
I heard it from the other merchants.
